entry.title: Frictionless Repository
entry.summary: Introducing you to Repository, the new Frictionless Data tool that allows you to automate the validation workflows of your datasets.

entry.title: Open Data Blend
entry.summary: Open Data Blend is a set of open data services that aim to make large and complex UK open data easier to analyse.

entry.title: A Bittersweet Ending to Frictionless Fellows Cohort 2
entry.summary: As a final assignment, the Fellows have written blogs reflecting upon their experiences and what they learned during the programme...

entry.title: A Short Case Study Involving Table Schema Frictionless Specs at the European Union
entry.summary: The Frictionless specifications are helping with simplifying data validation for applications in production at the European Union.

entry.title: Frictionless Data June 2021 Virtual Hangout
entry.summary: At our June Frictionless Data community call we had Nikhil Vats giving a presentation on Frictionless Package for InterMine...

entry.title: Welcome Livemark - the New Frictionless Data Tool
entry.summary: Introducing you to Livemark, the new Frictionless Data tool that allows you to publish data articles easily.

entry.title: Announcing New Changes to Our Website
entry.summary: We have finished making some new changes that we are very excited to tell you about!

entry.title: Frictionless Data May 2021 Virtual Hangout
entry.summary: On our last Frictionless Data community call on May 29 we had Simon Tyrrell and Xingdong Bian from the Earlham Institute giving a presentation on Frictionless Data for Wheat.
